segment.source: Description: When you are finished creating your app's submission and click Submit to the Store, it enters the certification step.
segment.target: Description: When you are finished creating your app's submission and click Submit to the Store, it enters the certification step.

segment.source: title: The app certification process
segment.target: title: The app certification process

segment.source: ms.assetid: 0DCB4344-224D-4E5A-899F-FF7A89F23DBC
segment.target: ms.assetid: 0DCB4344-224D-4E5A-899F-FF7A89F23DBC

segment.source: The app certification process
segment.target: The app certification process

segment.source: When you are finished creating your app's submission and click Submit to the Store, it enters the certification step.
segment.target: When you are finished creating your app's submission and click Submit to the Store, it enters the certification step.

segment.source: This process usually is completed within a few hours, though in some cases it may take longer.
segment.target: This process usually is completed within a few hours, though in some cases it may take longer.

segment.source: Here's a look at what happens during the certification step.
segment.target: Here's a look at what happens during the certification step.

segment.source: Preprocessing: After you successfully upload the app's packages and submit the app for certification, the packages are queued for testing.
segment.target: Preprocessing: After you successfully upload the app's packages and submit the app for certification, the packages are queued for testing.

segment.source: We'll display a message if we detect any errors during preprocessing.
segment.target: We'll display a message if we detect any errors during preprocessing.

segment.source: For more info on possible errors, see Resolve submission errors.
segment.target: For more info on possible errors, see Resolve submission errors.

segment.source: Certification: During this phase, several tests are conducted:
segment.target: Certification: During this phase, several tests are conducted:

segment.source: Security tests: This first test checks your app's packages for viruses and malware.
segment.target: Security tests: This first test checks your app's packages for viruses and malware.

segment.source: If your app fails this test, you'll need to check your development system by running the latest antivirus software, then rebuild your app's package on a clean system.
segment.target: If your app fails this test, you'll need to check your development system by running the latest antivirus software, then rebuild your app's package on a clean system.

segment.source: Technical compliance tests: Technical compliance is tested by the Windows App Certification Kit.
segment.target: Technical compliance tests: Technical compliance is tested by the Windows App Certification Kit.

segment.source: (You should always make sure to test your app with the Windows App Certification Kit before you submit it to the Store.)
segment.target: (You should always make sure to test your app with the Windows App Certification Kit before you submit it to the Store.)

segment.source: Content compliance: The amount of time this takes varies depending on how complex your app is, how much visual content it has, and how many apps have been submitted recently.
segment.target: Content compliance: The amount of time this takes varies depending on how complex your app is, how much visual content it has, and how many apps have been submitted recently.

segment.source: Be sure to provide any info that testers should be aware of in the Notes for certification page.
segment.target: Be sure to provide any info that testers should be aware of in the Notes for certification page.

segment.source: After the certification process is complete, you'll get a certification report telling you whether or not your app passed certification.
segment.target: After the certification process is complete, you'll get a certification report telling you whether or not your app passed certification.

segment.source: If it didn't pass, the report will indicate which test failed or which policy was not met.
segment.target: If it didn't pass, the report will indicate which test failed or which policy was not met.

segment.source: After you fix the problem, you can create a new submission for your app to start the certification process again.
segment.target: After you fix the problem, you can create a new submission for your app to start the certification process again.

segment.source: Release: When your app passes certification, it's ready to move to the to the Publishing process.
segment.target: Release: When your app passes certification, it's ready to move to the to the Publishing process.

segment.source: If you've indicated that your submission should be published as soon as possible, this will happen right away.
segment.target: If you've indicated that your submission should be published as soon as possible, this will happen right away.

segment.source: If you've specified that it should not be released until a certain date, we'll wait until that date, unless you click the link to Change release date.
segment.target: If you've specified that it should not be released until a certain date, we'll wait until that date, unless you click the link to Change release date.

segment.source: If you've indicated that you want to publish the submission manually, then we won't publish it until you indicate that we should by clicking the button to Publish now, or if you click the link to Change release date and pick a specific date.
segment.target: If you've indicated that you want to publish the submission manually, then we won't publish it until you indicate that we should by clicking the button to Publish now, or if you click the link to Change release date and pick a specific date.

segment.source: Publishing: Your app's packages are digitally signed to protect them against tampering after they have been released.
segment.target: Publishing: Your app's packages are digitally signed to protect them against tampering after they have been released.

segment.source: Once this phase has begun, you can no longer cancel your submission or change its release date.
segment.target: Once this phase has begun, you can no longer cancel your submission or change its release date.

segment.source: After successfully going through the steps above, your submission will be available in the Windows Store for customers to download.
segment.target: After successfully going through the steps above, your submission will be available in the Windows Store for customers to download.

segment.source: Note We also conduct spot checks of apps after they've been published so we can identity potential problems and ensure that your app complies with all of the Windows Store Policies.
segment.target: Note We also conduct spot checks of apps after they've been published so we can identity potential problems and ensure that your app complies with all of the Windows Store Policies.

segment.source: If we find any problems, you'll be notified about the issue and how to fix it, if applicable, or if it has been removed from the Store.
segment.target: If we find any problems, you'll be notified about the issue and how to fix it, if applicable, or if it has been removed from the Store.
